system.description: You shift your consciousness into a consenting Pokemon. Your body enters a helpless, catatonic state during this time and you instead control the host body, utilising it's skills and traits, with the addition of retained access to your [Aura] perks. You may end this effect at any time with a Complex Action. If the host is @Affliction[fainted] while your consciousness is present, your own body also gains a stack of @Affliction[weary]. If the user dies while shifted, this would typically sever the connection. GMs may wish to consider instead making the shift permanent.
